content.question: ​The function <math alttext="p"><semantics><mi>p</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="p open parentheses theta close parentheses equals 3 tan open parentheses pi over 2 open parentheses theta plus 1 close parentheses close parentheses minus 4"><semantics><mrow><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>θ</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>tan</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What is the period of <math alttext="p"><semantics><mi>p</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
